title: PMAY shall be permissible in respective zones, within distances mentioned in following table with FSI and other provisions mentioned in Regulation No
clause_text: PMAY shall be permissible in respective zones, within distances mentioned in following table with FSI and other provisions mentioned in Regulation No.14.4.1(i) & (ii).
